chapter.text: 87|1|Apani apanara sumahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna [1]
87|3|Ara yini nirdharana karena [1] atahpara pathanirdesa karena [2]
87|6|Sighra'i amara apanake patha karaba, phale apani bhulabena na [1]
87|7|allah ya icche karena ta chara [1]. Niscaya tini janena ya prakasya o ya gopaniya.
87|8|Ara amara apanara jan'ya sugama kare deba sahaja patha [1].
87|9|Atahpara upadesa yadi phalaprasu haya tabe upadesa dina [1]
87|10|ye bhaya kare se'i upadesa grahana karabe [1].
87|11|Ara ta upeksa karabe ye nitanta hatabhagya
87|13|tarapara sekhane se marabe'o na bamcabe'o na [1].
87|14|Abasya'i saphalya labha karabe ye parisud'dha haya [1].
87|15|Ebam tara rabera nama smarana kare o salata kayema kare [1].
